description:
Seadra was Mandi`s second choice of Pokémon after his Exeguttor was beaten by Ash`s Krabby which, after the victory had just evolved into Kingler.
Seadra charged quickly towards Kingler whose attempted to counter with a water gun was dodged. As Seadra got closer, Kingler changed its attack to a Bubble and managed to send Seadra skywards as it could not dodge and maneuver around the attacks. Ash ordered Kingler to use a crabhammer on the airbourne Seadra and knocked its back into the water, eliminating it from the battle in the Process.
A clearly annoyed Mandi had to once again calm himself before choosing his final Pokémon, a Golbat
name: Seadra (Kom)
